revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Rabuta |image = [[File:Rabuta.png]] |caption = Even though it is bitter, it should be eaten peel and all. The hair on the peel cleans the stomach from the inside. |growtime = 3h 24m 0s |harvest = 28 berries |replant = 10% |points = 600 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *20 bitter *10 sour }} '''Rabuta''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an [[Aspear]] with at least 1 [[Aguav]]. The [[Aspear]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 7 mins 10 secs || 23 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 24 mins - 4 hours 48 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RabutaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RabutaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
